00034 NxVec3 Arrival::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00035 {
00036         // find desired orientation
00037         aInfo->m_vDesiredOrientation = aInfo->m_vTarget - aInfo->m_vPos;
00038         // find desired velocity
00039         NxVec3 arrival = m_fcKArrival * aInfo->m_vDesiredOrientation;
00040         // constrain desired velocity
00041         if (arrival.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00042         {
00043                 aInfo->m_vDesiredOrientation.normalize();
00044                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vDesiredOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00045         }
00046         else
00047                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = arrival;
00048 
00049         // retun desired velocity
00050         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00051         
00052 }
